summary: Burnley F.C. is an English soccer team from Burnley, Lancashire. They play in the EFL Championship, the second-highest league in England, after being relegated from the Premier League. The club was founded in 1882 and was one of the first to turn professional. They have a rich history, winning the English league title twice and the FA Cup once. Burnley holds the record for the longest unbeaten league run in England with 30 matches. Their home stadium is Turf Moor, and their colors are claret and blue. The team is nicknamed "The Clarets."
title: Burnley F.C.
